channel.title: FLF - God, Law, and Liberty
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Dominion Mandate Meets Positive Law [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: The proposed federal “Parental Rights and Responsibilities Act, and similar legislation in the states, may look like it is in furtherance of the dominion mandate, because parents have God-given rights and a God-given jurisdiction in relation to their children. Today David explains why there could be nothing further from the truth than that assumption.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Looking at the Dominion Mandate in Real Time [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: In recent years, the “dominion mandate” in Genesis 1 has come alive for many Christians. Today David begins a three-week series that looks at various considerations for its fulfillment. This week, he looks at its application in the context of abortion legislation, and the divisions it has exposed among Christians. Has this situation exposed something that must precede taming the wilderness?
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
